00019     int Net::addNeuron(ActivationFunction::Base& _activationFunction)
00020     {
00021         if(!neurons.insert( pair<int, Neuron>(++lastNeuronId, Neuron(_activationFunction)) ).second)
00022             throw Exception::ElementExists()<<"Net::addNeuron(): insertion of neuron "<<lastNeuronId<<" failed\n";
00023         
00024         return lastNeuronId;
00025     } //addNeuron
00026 
00027     void Net::delNeuron(int _neuronId)
00028     {
00029         if(!neurons.erase(_neuronId))
00030             throw Exception::ObjectNotFound()<<"Net::delNeuron(): neuron "<<_neuronId<<" not found\n";
00031     }
00032 
00033     Neuron& Net::getNeuron(int _neuronId)
00034     {
00035         map<int, Neuron>::iterator i = neurons.find(_neuronId);
00036         if(i == neurons.end())
00037             throw Exception::ObjectNotFound()<<"Net::getNeuron(): neuron "<< _neuronId<<"not found\n";
00038 
00039         return i->second;
00040     } //getNeuron
00041 }; //pann
